website_summaries.verdict: This large memory foam beanbag cradles your body for ultimate comfort.
pros: Filled with memory foam for a soft, comfortable feel
cons: Some users have complained that the chair is not as full as it appears in photos

customer_reviews.title: I love my beanbag
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my beanbag. Its big and comfortable. It is kind of in the way in my small living room but its always in use so that's amazing! would recommend it to anyone who plays video games or has smaller children and a recliner is not big enough.. I like to get down on the floor on there level and this helps because i can sit lower but its way more comfy then sitting on the floor .
customer_reviews.author: KimberleeAnne

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy Lounger
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's bday but everyone in the house (including dogs) use it. It's very comfortable and large enough for an adult to lounge on it. You can even fit two adults who want to cuddle! Our dogs love it too and it has become their main napping spot. Because of this I have washed the cover a number of times since purchasing it in February. The cover is easy to get on and off, cleans well, and has shown no signs of wear. I am also surprised it hasn't ripped from the dogs' nails too! Definitely recommend this lounger over other more expensive brands...very good deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This chair came in a vacuum sealed bag and was ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair came in a vacuum sealed bag and was supposed to "fluff" in 2-3 days. 2 weeks later, it STILL has not puffed up properly. I took the ball of memory foam and broke it apart with my hands...took an hour. And WOW is it ever heavy.
customer_reviews.author: JD Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Humongous!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this thing is humongous!! We love it. It is part of our living room furniture and is very durable. I have a very rambunctious 7 year old son who jumps on this bean bag everyday. It stays pretty clean too. I packaging the product was an adventure in itself. The bean bag is made of pieces of what feel like memory foam. It’s compact in the box it’s delivered in and you have to break it up for growth. This was fun because we jumped on it and threw it across the room!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Stewart

customer_reviews.title: its good
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. I read a number of reviews and was hesitant to purchase this but I'm glad I did. I spent about 20 minutes really separating the foam when I first got it out of the bag and it's been great since. You pick it up and turn it over and shake it around and it goes back to full form. Then set in it and it forms to how you sat in it. Repeat. No problem. I'm 6' 210 lb and have sat on it alone and with someone. I like to put it the tall way up and with an extra pillow for a headrest I'll use it kind of like chair.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: ... chairs for a long time and I am so happy to have found it so reasonable
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these chairs for a long time and I am so happy to have found it so reasonable. It came quickly and set up was a breeze. There was a slight odor to the filler foam but nothing terrible. That is what fabreeze is for. This is large (very) comfortable and I love it for doing mediation. I will probably purchase more in the future as everyone who sits in it loves it!

customer_reviews.title: This Modern BeanBag is Bodacious!
customer_reviews.text: Other than UPS Holding this AmaZon package hostage for a week (because it was an oversiZed item), this ChillSack is awesome! The chocolate brown color is classy and matches our decor. It’s really comfortable. My husband and I sit together on it in front of the fireplace regularly. Our legs are on the floor when we sit side by side. Neck support is tricky, so have a pillow nearby (I use a king bed pillow for max comfort). Heavy for a female to set up on her own (unless you’re really strong).

Every Chill Sack has double stitched seams for extra strength and extended use. 

MADE IN THE USA: 
Chill Sacks are proudly made right here at home in the USA with high quality, light and fluffy, shredded foam, premium zippers, and hand selected fabrics that are double stitched for maximum strength and durability.
